test.name: TEST-DEF-80810
test.description: Define a test where a regular partition tries to write the kernel memory area, namely the number of ticks since boot. Check that a health monitor event is raised. Check that the remaining partitions are not affected.

teststep.description: Calculate the initial MD5 of the relevant partition 1 memory zones.
Attempt to write the kernel memory area (number of ticks since boot). Verify that a trap was raised.
Check that the MD5 of the partition 1 memory zones has not been altered.
